message: I'm excited to offer you the product for $1400000. I think it's a great deal for both of us!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $1250000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and allows for some profit for you.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1350000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.

Alice, I understand your need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with $1350000. I'm happy to meet you halfway on our previous offers and offer $1300000. This is a fair price that allows us both to make a reasonable deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, Bob, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to compromise at $1320000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price for both of us.
